title: Seeds Of Legend Book two
description: In this, the second part of the saga Seeds Of Legend, Amrie Emrys comes of age amid the echoes of the prophesies of Merlin. Political intrigue and the arts of war shape her life as she gathers the power and knowledge she will need as the legend of her father, King Arthur comes to a close. With his death, Amrie must begin to find her way through chaos and war as she seeks to reunite all of Britain under the Pendragon House. Colorful characters, well-woven subplots, and an ending that will leave you longing for Book Three, Seeds Of Legend ~ Book Two will hold you rapt from the first page.
author: Robbin L. Stoddard
